description: This file defines a React functional component named 'TopBar' that renders a user interface header with a user email display, language selector, notifications bell, theme toggle button, and logout button. It utilizes hooks for authentication context and translation, and imports other React components.

methods.name: TopBar({ theme, onToggleTheme })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the application's top navigation bar with user info, language selection, notifications, theme toggle, and logout functionality.
